name: Antrim Escape 3
description:
Thanks to the support of 3 million fans, the grand finale of App store monster hit Antrim Escape is finally here! There will be puzzled love, puzzled hate, and certainly lots of awesome puzzles to engage you in the dauntingly beautiful castle in N.Ireland. Emma and Ryan need your help to defeat the evil castle owner and go home!

Antrim Escape 3 is a room escape game. You will be joining the characters on their epic journey of solving unthinkable, brain busting puzzles to escape many rooms.

Features:
- 50 creative and challenging puzzles that will boost up your IQ by 100% after beating them all.

- Scenes after scenes of stunning retina HD graphics take you right back into 19th century way of romance.

- 4 chapters of fun, stories, mini-games, and comics to keep you entertained for days.

- Too difficult? Don't worry! Our detail in-game hint system and tutorial will hold your hand through any trouble.

If you like Antrim Escape III, you should catch up on the first two of the trilogy, AEI and AE2. Get them today on sale!

Visit us @ www.gamehive.com
Follow us @ twitter.com/GameHive
Like us @ facebook.com/AntrimEscape
